name: Retrofeeding
description:
Retrofeeding is considered to be the first game ilky made by herself. It's a very short game made in one day; the day she learned how to use Game Maker Studio.The game features ilky's head and various 8 bit computers. You should catch those.

You should avoid VR glasses because who needs VR, right?

Anyway, she knows it's bad.
Try to enjoy.

-- ilky.

Oh, and the second picture is from when I broke the game. It doesn't happen now.
